result.name: music-education-hub-data-return
result.notes: The return consists of information to be collected by all hub lead organisations for the previous academic year, as a condition of their grant agreement with Arts Council England.

organization.name: arts-council-england
organization.title: Arts Council England
organization.description:
Arts Council England champions, develops and invests in artistic and cultural experiences to enrich people’s lives. It supports a range of activities across the arts, museums and libraries - from theatre to digital art - reading to dance, music to literature, and crafts to collections.

Arts Council England is an executive non-departmental public body of the Department for Culture, Media & Sport

http://www.artscouncil.org.uk/

result.title: Music Education Hub Data Return

extras.value: Headline data is produced however the raw data is provided to us in confidence by MEH organisations. The raw data is then used to produce Official National Statistics.
